des: Looking to enlist in the U.S. Army and curious about how it works? Read this article to get a better sense of the process.

tit: ASVAB Scores and Enlisted Army Jobs
sub: A Tool to Determine Enlisted Army Jobs Based on Line Scores
des: Input your Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery (ASVAB) composite scores to view the U.S. Army's enlisted jobs for which you qualify.
